---
title: 'Life Expectancy'
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(modelr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- gapminder %>%
  rename(expectancy = lifeExp)
```

```{r, dev = 'svg'}
data %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, expectancy, group = country)) +
    geom_line(alpha = 0.2)
```

## Life Expectancy in Sweden

```{r, dev = 'svg', fig.width = 10, fig.height = 4}
data <- data %>%
  filter(country == 'Sweden')

model <- lm(expectancy ~ year, data = data)

plot1 <- data %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, expectancy)) +
  geom_line()

plot2 <- data %>%
  add_residuals(model, 'residual') %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, residual)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = 'white', size = 3) +
  geom_line()

cowplot::plot_grid(plot1, plot2)
```
